content.rendered:
Public notice for all intending to travel to Dubai: be informed that Wednesday the 23rd of June 2021, Dubai will open her boarder and passenger can easily fly from Nigeria to Dubai.

Also UAE government has put out lists of accredited labs for covid 19test.
Ensure that you get your covid 19 certificate through the approved Labs. Any passenger with a certificate not issued from the approved lab cannot board.
Emmye Travels ensure that you have the best travel updates and we are available to serve you.
We vow to help you fulfill your travel abroad dreams.
